# coordinateSpace

**Instance Property**

The coordinate space of the focus items contained in the focus item container.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var coordinateSpace: any UICoordinateSpace { get }
```

## Discussion

The focus items returned by [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIFocusItemContainer/focusItems(in:)] should report their frames in this coordinate space.

## Retrieving focus items

- **focusItems(in:)**: Retrieves all of the focus items within this container that intersect with the provided rectangle.

items.description: Retrieves all of the focus items within this container that intersect with the provided rectangle.
